resources.string: This app is part of the final year dissertation of Jesús Manuel Sánchez Martínez.

This project aims at exploring the possibilities of GoogleGlass for participatory multiagent indoor evacuation simulations.\nParticipatory multiagent simulation combines scenario-guided agents and google-glass equipped humans that coexist in a shared virtual space and jointly perform simulations. In this project, the simulation will simulate an evacuation of the ground floor of the building B in the Telecommunication Engineering School of the Universidad Politécnica de Madrid.
The project is divided in 3 parts:
· Google Glass Application\n· Web Service\n· Android application
